structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Deduction Of Gratuity From Gift Certificate Without Consent; Penalty
law.text: Whoever redeems a gift certificate, as defined in section 1 of chapter 255D and deducts a gratuity therefrom without the consent of the holder of the gift certificate, shall be punished by a fine of not more than $300 per violation.
